issue.title: [Java] Improve the performance of comparing two blocks of heap data
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6935](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6935). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement methods to compare data word by word, instead of byte by byte.
Benchmarks shows that there is a 4.5x performance improvement:

ByteFunctionHelpersBenchmarks.builtInByteArrayEquals  avgt    5  437.504 ± 1.120  ns/op
ByteFunctionHelpersBenchmarks.byteArrayEquals         avgt    5   97.700 ± 0.178  ns/op
